reviews.quote: “The lead vocals are emotional and compelling, while the backing vocals are rich and almost angelic within the darkness of "Siren Call." And the lyrics are interesting and socially aware.”
“Eugene Delta is a master of the visceral going by this work and we're glad to be pulled along on its mysterious but also dreamy escapade.”
“An etheral production with some lovely production and really emotive vocals and widescreen heft to its delivery.”
reviews.linkName: We All Want Someone To Shout For

reviews.quote: “very epic tune also because of the video, good songwriting and a great song structure”
“The dreamy, drifting tones are great, and the vocals float through with real feeling.”
“The atmospheric production and vocal work mesmerize.”
